Date: Wed, 14 Aug 2019 18:19:35 +0000 
(USANYS)" 
Will report that federal prosecutors and investigators are probing whether the two staffers guarding Jeffrey Epstein's unit 
the night of his death falsified records that logged how often they were checking on him. 
If the staffers are found to have falsified records, they could face criminal charges in the Southern District of New York. 
Public Affairs 
United States Department of Justice 
U.S. Attorney's Office I Southern District of New York 
EFTA00017786
